isis.stitle: TSI 08-12-13 - Serial Number Prefix Change and New Engine Features

subjectgroup.subject: Serial Number Prefix Change and New Engine Features

geninfo.title: Serial Number Prefix
geninfo.para: Serial number prefix 4.5 was assigned to earlier VT 275 and International® MaxxForce™ 5 Diesel Engines for serial number 0518487 and down. Serial number example: 4.5HM2Y0518347
A new serial number prefix 4.6 was assigned for International® MaxxForce™ 5 Diesel Engines for serial numbers 0518488-up. Serial number example: 4.6HM2Y0518501

note.para: Serial number prefix 4.5 did not change for International® VT 275 Diesel Engines.

geninfo.title: new engine features
geninfo.para: New components, modified components or design changes listed in this TSI distinguish the International® MaxxForce™ 5 Diesel Engine from the International® VT 275 Diesel Engine.

item.para: New Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) cooler was enlarged to increase efficiency
Added Intake Throttle Valve (ITV) to help control the aftertreatment regeneration process
Added spacer to raise turbocharger for new EGR cooler
Added oil drain for high-pressure turbocharger
Intake manifold (Modified coolant inlet, outlet, and hanging bracket for new EGR cooler)
Modified air inlet duct to decrease inlet restriction
Modified turbocharger oil supply tube and low-pressure oil drain
Crossover tube on turbocharger is mounted above the high-pressure discharge tube
Modified exhaust piping (Flange change and higher mounting of turbocharger)
A single Electronic Control Module (ECM) integrates IDM and EGR functions
